sentences.en: Effect gas inlet pressure, geometrical de - sign and relative position of metal delivery tube, atomization gas, etc.
sentences.cn: 本文研究了雾化压力 、 导液管的几何形状和相对位置以及雾化介质等因素对雾化过程导液管末端气体射流与金属液流作用区压力特征的影响规律.

sentences.en: Electro - spray is a spray atomization improvement technique by using the electrostatic force.
sentences.cn: 静电喷雾技术应用于防疫消毒,具有经济、高效、低污染等特点.

sentences.en: Improve carburetor function , Upgrade atomization function , Complete combustion, Increase power performance.
sentences.cn: 促进汽油预热效果,达到100%全燃烧, 保持引擎和汽缸室的清洁, 减少机油污染, 能延续引擎寿命,保持最佳动力.

sentences.en: Improve carburetor function, Upgrade atomization function , Fully burining, Increase power performance.
sentences.cn: 增加溶氧量、高燃点,加快汽油和空气的结合作用, 燃烧迅速,爆发动力加倍,使引擎运转更加顺畅.

sentences.en: Pre - alloyed powder is sprayed through water atomization method.
sentences.cn: 用水雾化制粉的方法来制取预合金粉末.

sentences.en: Result: Vaporous atomization has a great antiinflammatory effect on swelling caused by.
sentences.cn: 目的: 考察利咽雾化液抗炎抑菌作用效果.

sentences.en: Spherical tungsten powder produced by plasma atomization technique is described.
sentences.cn: 本文尝试了用等离子喷雾技术制取球形钨粉.

sentences.en: Take atomization generator and fix it with seal rings then press gently into the spray gun.
sentences.cn: 取出雾化发生器,加装好密封圈后轻轻压入喷雾枪主体.

sentences.en: The atomization process is more sensitive to disturbance than vaporization.
sentences.cn: 雾化过程比汽化过程对扰动更为敏感.

sentences.en: The content of impurities in water - is greater than that in gas - atomization.
sentences.cn: 气雾化粉末触媒氧等杂质含量远低于水雾化.

sentences.en: The expressions were derived to describe the atomization efficiency a stabilized temperature platform furnace ( STPF ).
sentences.cn: 导出在稳温平台石墨炉内原子 化效率 的表示式.

sentences.en: The pressure drop was the driving force of atomization by nozzle.
sentences.cn: 压降是喷嘴雾化的原动力.

sentences.en: Theresults of experiment show that atomization cooling can achieve its aim.
sentences.cn: 实验结果表明,雾化制冷是可以达到目的的.

sentences.en: This air improves the atomization of fuel coming fron the low - speed port .
sentences.cn: 这些空气改善了从 低速 出口喷出的燃料的雾化.

sentences.en: Whole set of industrialization technology of producing metal powder by atomization.
sentences.cn: 提供低松装密度高强度雾化铜粉,高品质铜锡10粉及雾化制粉工业化生产技术.

words.tran_cn: 原子的，原子能的；微粒子的
使分为原子；使雾化（等于atomize）
使分裂为原子；将…喷成雾状；使遭受原子弹轰炸

trans.tran_cn: 分离成原子，以原子弹摧毁，雾化，弥雾
